title: Zod to mongoose
text: Helps you convert zod schemas to mongoose models and schemas

usage.title: Usage
usage.convert: Then, convert it to mongoose schema and connect model:
usage.use: That's it! Now you can use your mongoose model as usual:

raw.title: Raw schema
raw.text: If you want to get raw object from zod schema to modify it, you can use zodSchemaRaw function:

check.text: To make sure nothing is missing, you can use Schema.obj:
